system.description:
You have begun to realize that the magic of your bloodline and the magic of your item are, if not in common, then at least of a piece. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your sorcerer levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of gaining the Spellsword feature. You can use Spellsword when casting sorcerer spells with your bonded artifact as a spellcasting focus.
  • Half your wielder levels count as sorcerer levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.q162ah61o4pgc1dd]{Metamagic} feature.
  • Charged Exertion allows you to convert to or from sorcery points at the same 2-for-1 exchange rate as exertion points or artifact charges, converting 2 sorcery points into an exertion point or an artifact charge or converting 2 exertion points or 2 artifact charges into a sorcery point. You may only perform one conversion per turn.
  • You can spend a sorcery point to instantly draw a weapon (no action required).
